{{noref|date=January 2011}} {{Infobox diocese | jurisdiction = Diocese | name = Lucena | latin = Dioecesis Lucenensis | local = Diyosesis ng Lucena | image = | image_size = frameless | image_alt = | caption = | country = {{flag|Philippines}} | metropolitan = | territory = [[Quezon]] | province = [[Roman Catholic Archdiocese of Lipa|Archdiocese of Lipa]] | coordinates = | area_km2 = 2,334 | population = 948,093 | parishes = 36 | churches = 36 | congregations = | schools = | members = | denomination = [[Roman Catholic]] | rite = [[Roman Rite]] | established = March 28, 1950 | cathedral = Cathedral Parish of Saint Ferdinand(Lucena Cathedral) | cocathedral = | patroness = [[Ferdinand III of Castile|Saint Ferdinand]] | priests = 189+ | pope = {{Incumbent pope}} | bishop = Most Rev. Emilio Z. Marquez, [[Doctor of Divinity|DD.]] | metro_archbishop = [[Ramon Arguelles]]
Archbishop of Lipa | coadjutor = | auxiliary_bishops = | vicar_general = Rev. Msgr. Leandro N. Castro, P.C. | emeritus_bishops = Most Reverend Ruben T. Profugo, [[D.D.]] | map = | map_alt = | map_caption = | website = | footnotes = }} The '''Roman Catholic Diocese of Lucena''' (Lat: ''Dioecesis Lucenensis'') is a [[diocese]] of the [[Latin Rite]] of the [[Roman Catholic Church]] in the [[Philippines]]. The diocese was erected in 1950 from the [[Roman Catholic Archdiocese of Lipa|Archdiocese of Lipa]], and remains suffragan to the Archdiocese of Lipa. Two dioceses have been split off from Lucena, the [[Roman Catholic Diocese of Boac|Diocese of Boac]] in 1977, and the [[Roman Catholic Diocese of Gumaca|Diocese of Gumaca]] in 1984. The current bishop is Emilio Z. Marquez, appointed in 2003. ==Ordinaries== *[[Alfredo Obviar|Alfredo Maria Obviar y Aranda]] † (4 Nov 1950 Appointed - 25 Sep 1976 Retired) *José Tomás Sánchez † (25 Sep 1976 Succeeded - 12 Jan 1982 Appointed, Archbishop of Nueva Segovia) *Ruben T. Profugo (15 May 1982 Appointed - 13 Sep 2003 Resigned) *Emilio Z. Marquez (13 Sep 2003 Succeeded - present) ==Jurisdiction== ===Episcopal District of Saint John=== ====Shrine==== *'''Diocesan Shrine of Saint Jude Thaddeus''' - Cotta, Lucena City ====Vicariate of Saint Peter==== *'''Saint Ferdinand Cathedral''' - Lucena City *'''Our Lady of Lourdes Parish''' - Iyam, Lucena City *'''Saint Isidore Labrador Parish''' - Ibabang Dupay, Lucena City *'''Saint Raphael the Archangel Parish''' - Dalahican, Lucena City *'''Holy Face of Jesus Parish''' - University Site, Lucena City *'''Our Lady of Peñafrancia Parish''' - Capistrano Subdivision, Gulang-Gulang, Lucena City ===Episcopal District of Saint Mark=== ====Shrines==== *'''Diocesan Shrine of Santo Cristo de Burgos''' - Sariaya, Quezon *'''Diocesan Shrine of Our Lady of Sorrows''' - Dolores, Quezon ====Vicariate of Saint Philip==== *'''San Pedro Bautista Parish''' - Candelaria, Quezon *'''Saint Catherine of Sienna Parish''' - Santa Catalina Sur, Candelaria, Quezon *'''Our Mother of Perpetual Help Parish''' - Taguan, Candelaria, Quezon *'''Saint Francis of Assisi Parish ''' - Sariaya, Quezon *'''Immaculate Conception Parish''' - Lutucan, Sariaya, Quezon *'''Our Lady of Guadalupe Parish''' - Concepcion, Sariaya, Quezon *'''Niña Maria Parish''' - Castañas, Sariaya, Quezon ====Vicariate of Saint Simon==== *'''Saint John the Baptist Parish''' - Tiaong, Quezon *'''Our Lady of the Most Holy Rosary Parish''' - Cabay, Tiaong, Quezon *'''Blessed Virgin Mary Queen of the World Parish''' - Lusacan, Tiaong, Quezon *'''Sacred Heart of Jesus Parish''' - San Antonio, Quezon ===Episcopal District of Saint Luke=== ====Vicariate of Saint Thomas==== *'''Saint Louis Bishop Parish''' - Lucban, Quezon *'''Saint Bonaventure Parish''' - Mauban, Quezon *'''Saint Lorenzo Ruiz de Manila Parish''' - Polo, Mauban, Quezon *'''Saint Vincent Ferrer Parish''' - Sampaloc, Quezon ====Vicariate of Saint James==== *'''Minor Basilica of Saint Michael the Archangel''' - Tayabas City *'''Saint Roch Parish''' - Ilasan, Tayabas City *'''Our Mother of Perpetual Help Parish''' - Ibabang Bukal, Tayabas City ===Episcopal District of Saint Matthew=== ====Shrine==== *'''Diocesan Shrine of Saint Anne''' - Malicboy, Pagbilao, Quezon ====Vicariate of Saint Matthias==== *'''Our Lady of the Angels Parish''' - Atimonan, Quezon *'''Our Lady of Lourdes Parish''' - Malinao, Atimonan, Quezon *'''Our Lady of Peace and Good Voyage Parish''' - Ponon, Atimonan, Quezon *'''Our Lady of the Holy Rosary Parish''' - Plaridel, Quezon ====Vicariate of Saint Bartholomew==== *'''St. Isidore the Farmer Parish - Agdangan, Quezon *'''St. Peter the Apostle Parish''' - Unisan, Quezon *'''Saint Roch Parish''' - Panaon, Unisan, Quezon ====Vicariate of Saint Andrew==== *'''Saint Catherine of Alexandria Parish''' - Pagbilao, Quezon *'''Holy Cross Parish''' - Padre Burgos, Batangas ==See also== *[[Catholic Church in the Philippines]] == External links == * [http://luminouscrossofgrace.com/ Sanctuary in Agdangan, Quezon] {{coord missing|Philippines}} {{Roman Catholic dioceses in the Philippines}} [[Category:Roman Catholic dioceses in the Philippines|Lucena]] [[Category:Religious organizations established in 1950|Lucena]] [[Category:Roman Catholic dioceses and prelatures established in the 20th century|Lucena]] [[Category:1950 establishments in the Philippines]]
